name: Drawing of a Ewer
description: Drawing of a Ewer; Attributed to Robert-Joseph Auguste (French, 1723 - 1805, master by royal order 1757); Paris, France; about 1775 - 1780; Brown ink with brown and gray washes; 40.2 x 25.6 cm (15 13/16 x 10 1/16 in.); 79.GA.180; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Drawing of a Ewer
medium: Brown ink with brown and gray washes
